name: ooh
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of surprise, pleasure, approval, disapproval, or pain: Ooh, what a gorgeous dress! Ooh, yes, that would be nice! Ooh, that's really mean!

Add to word list
used to express surprise, pleasure, or approval: Ooh, I like that sauce they put on the fish.
